localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Customers want to know their data is protected. Trustpage makes it easy to show them how you do it. Take the right steps to safeguard your business and keep your customers happy with an all-in-one Trust Center.
nodes.title: Trustpage - Building trust with customers just got easier
nodes.author: Jonathon Triest

nodes.excerpt: LazyWeb is a conversational search engine with a simple chat interface free from ads and tracking. It's like messaging a smart friend that answers questions and sends you useful links. It's the first search engine where you control how results display.
nodes.title: LazyWeb Alpha - Search without ads or tracking. View results how you want.
nodes.author: Angela Hoover

nodes.excerpt: End-to-end encrypted email service ProtonMail has refreshed its design, updating with a cleaner look and a more customizable user interface â€” including the ability to pick from a bunch of themes (dark and contrasting versions are both in the mix).
nodes.title: ProtonMail 2.0 - Secure email that respects your privacy, with slick new look
nodes.author: Aditya

nodes.excerpt: Redact is a free desktop app that lets you easily mass delete or programmatically delete content from social networks and instant messengers. Ever want to delete all your political tweets from 2017-2021? Redact makes that easy. Reclaim your privacy.
nodes.title: Redact.dev - Mass delete your content on social networks and messengers
nodes.author: Dan Saltman

nodes.excerpt: WARP free VPN for desktop encrypts all the traffic from your machine and sends it directly to Cloudflareâ€™s edge, ensuring that no one in between is snooping your data â€” including your ISP. Keeps your traffic secure, private and fast.
nodes.title: WARP by Cloudflare - Privacy, security and speed for everyone
nodes.author: Rowe Morehouse

nodes.excerpt: GDPR Unpack is an all-in-one Notion workspace to help you easily comply with the European Data Protection Regulation
nodes.title: GDPR Unpack - GDPR made simple for small businesses
nodes.author: Antoine Milkoff

nodes.excerpt: https://passbase.com/ is an identity verification and https://passbase.com/aml-compliance that helps companies onboard users from over 190 countries and screen 6,000 government IDs. It can be integrated with no code at all or natively on https://docs.passbase.com/ and in check out flows in a matter of seconds.
nodes.title: Biometric Authentication by Passbase - Combining identity verification and secure user logins
nodes.author: Felix Gerlach

nodes.excerpt: Vanta is the fast and easy way to get SOC 2, HIPAA, or ISO 27001 certified. Over 1000 fast-growing companies trust Vanta to automate their security monitoring, and get ready for security audits in as little as two weeks.
nodes.title: Vanta - Your automated security and compliance expert
nodes.author: Hiten Shah

nodes.excerpt: With Typewise you make 4X fewer typos and enjoy 100% privacy. ğŸ¤– AI-powered Autocorrection (beats Gboard and SwiftKey) âª Undo Button: easily adjust corrections ğŸ’¬ Automatic Language Detection: no need to switch manually ğŸ”’ Offline Mode: maximum data protection

nodes.excerpt: Skotty enhances your communication with clients using smart modular blocks. A block can be anything from a file or message, to a file-request, signature or a video-call. You can combine and reorder blocks to match your workflows, then send them to anyone.
nodes.title: Skotty - Smarter online communication for professionals
nodes.author: Oscar van der Vleuten

nodes.excerpt: Protect and optimize your health â€“ long before warning signs appear! Find out your Health Index score and get true-to-you recommendations to improve your health for good. Then, watch your Health Index improve over time!
nodes.title: Vilua+ - Itâ€™s your health, take control
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: With these design patterns by Juro and Stefania Passera, you can turn boring legal text into a transparent, engaging document that people can actually read.
nodes.title: Privacy Policy Template by Juro - Get a privacy policy people can actually read
nodes.author: Christoph Janz

nodes.excerpt: AiCam turns old phone into an advanced tool to protect your home, your beloved ones and your pet. AiCam has smart alerts based on AI event detection, which runs offline to ensure complete data privacy. The app has recently gone live in Apple App Store.
nodes.title: AiCam - Smart home security with full data privacy
nodes.author: Mai Huong

nodes.excerpt: Obsidian is an OTP Authenticator designed for security, privacy, usability and seamless synchronisation across devices.
nodes.title: Obsidian 2.0 - OTP authenticator for iOS & macOS
nodes.author: Francesco Di Lorenzo

nodes.excerpt: A pretty, minimalistic TOTP 2-factor authentication app.
nodes.title: Bulwark - Beautifully simple 2FA
nodes.author: Leah Lundqvist

nodes.excerpt: BlockSurvey is an online form and survey platform with a focus on privacy and security. Think of it as an alternative to SurveyMonkey, Typeform, Google Forms but with a focus on privacy and security. It is powered by Stacks Blockchain.
nodes.title: BlockSurvey 2.0 - Secure forms & surveys, powered by Stacks blockchain
nodes.author: Wilson Bright

nodes.excerpt: The data management App that gives users ownership and control of their data - Collect your data from multiple platforms - View your data in an intuitive dashboard - Choose who can access your data and who can't
nodes.title: Rita Personal Data - Collect, view and control your data
nodes.author: Ben Lang

nodes.excerpt: Easily removes distracting settings and features from apps âœ¨ Turn off auto-play videos âœ¨ Hide news feeds âœ¨ Unsubscribe from notifications âœ¨ Hide recommendations âœ¨ Supports YouTube, Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and more
nodes.title: Channel - Removes distracting features from apps

nodes.excerpt: Web Analytics made simple and therefore privacy friendly. No Cookies. No logging. No IP address fingerprinting. We don't collect personal data, which allows serving many users with little hosting costs. The source code is published under the AGPLâ€‘v3 licence.
nodes.title: Counter - Simple and free web analytics
nodes.author: Bogdan Slomchinskiy

nodes.excerpt: Lunatask is an all-in-one privacy-focused todo list, habit and mood tracker, and pomodoro timer. It remembers stuff for you and helps you prioritize what to work on next. Markdown and end-to-end encryption included ğŸš€
nodes.title: Lunatask - All-in-one todo list, habit tracker and pomodoro timer
nodes.author: Michal KrejÄÃ­

nodes.excerpt: Simple and fast website analytics that belong to you. Fully GDPR & CCPA & PECR compliant. No more annoying cookie banners! Created and hosted in Switzerland ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡­
nodes.title: Nilly Analytics - Privacy-first web analytics from Switzerland
nodes.author: Gianluca

nodes.excerpt: Skizzle is a chrome extension for Gmail that makes end-to-end encryption dead easy - No passwords to remember, share or manage - Send encrypted attachments to any Gmail address - Verify file access on a public blockchain - Generous Free Forever plan
nodes.title: Skizzle - End-to-end encrypted attachments in Gmail
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: DPO-as-a-Service at Legal Nodes is 5 times more efficient than a DPO in-house. The monthly package includes: â—‹ designation of a DPO at your company; â—‹ 2 requests from your users; â—‹ 2 30-min consultations; â—‹ a tailored GDPR roadmap; â—‹ 3 document templates.
nodes.title: DPO as a Service - GDPR compliance with DPO as a Service
nodes.author: Margarita Sivakova

nodes.excerpt: Chatwoot is an open-source omnichannel communication platform built as an alternative to Intercom, Zendesk etc. Chatwoot helps you to connect email, website live chat, social media handles, WhatsApp etc. and manage all your customer interactions from one place.
nodes.title: Chatwoot - Open-source customer communication platform
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Postmodern is a mobile app designed for ephemeral, one-on-one, anonymous conversations. Whether we seek to explore our own minds, or the structures of our society, we need communication tools that allow us to peel away the pollutants to our thought.
nodes.title: Postmodern. - Short, anonymous conversations with strangers.
nodes.author: Nathaniel
